---
title: Review pull request
engine: knitr
params:
    pr_number: ""
    pr_url: ""
    user: "Ficks-Music"
    repo: "ficks"
---
```{r setup}
#| echo: false
Sys.setenv(PR_URL = params$pr_url)
Sys.setenv(REPO_USER = params$user)
Sys.setenv(REPO_NAME = params$repo)
```

## Pull request `r params$user`/`r params$repo` PR#`r params$pr_number`

```{bash}
#| echo: false
gh pr view "$PR_URL"
```

```{bash}
#| echo: false
gh pr view --comments "$PR_URL"
```
